thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale
thread.title: Tree Surgery Company Private / Commercial

title: Tree Surgery Company Private / Commercial
text: Location S E London Asking Price ï¿½ 215,000 The vendor established the business back in 1981 and now employs nine full time staff carrying out all aspects of tree surgery across S. E. London. This is a very well organised and profitable business with a strong brand name providing a comprehensive range of services that includes pruning, felling, stump removal, surveys and reports, planting and maintenance, hedge cutting and site clearance. The tree surgeons provide a tidy and professional service to both domestic and commercial clients, with no job too big or too small. The business operates from a well established leasehold yard with an excellent range of equipment plus well trained staff. The vendor has a number of excellent contacts due to the professionalism of the business. Operating in a niche market, this would be an excellent start up business for someone looking to work in this sector with all the contacts and large database in place or alternatively as a bolt on business for a company in the same sector looking to expand into a wider area. Financials
